movie.title: Hui Buh: Das Schlossgespenst
movie.description_intro: Five hundred years ago, Hui Buh cheated in a card game, thus was turned into a ghost by thunder lighting. For all this time, he has lived in the castle alone without anyone to scare. Until when King Julius moves in for his wedding, Hui Buh knows he has to use every trick of his to keep the long-wasted ghost license.
movie.description_full: Five hundred years ago, Hui Buh cheated in a card game, thus was turned into a ghost by thunder lighting. For all this time, he has lived in the castle alone without anyone to scare. Until when King Julius moves in for his wedding, Hui Buh knows he has to use every trick of his to keep the long-wasted ghost license.

movies.title: The Devil's in the Details
movies.summary: After serving a brutal tour of duty, veteran soldier Thomas Conrad is looking forward to a peaceful life at home with his family. But a drug cartel's ruthless enforcer has other plans for him.
movies.description_full: After serving a brutal tour of duty, veteran soldier Thomas Conrad is looking forward to a peaceful life at home with his family. But a drug cartel's ruthless enforcer has other plans for him.
movies.synopsis: After serving a brutal tour of duty, veteran soldier Thomas Conrad is looking forward to a peaceful life at home with his family. But a drug cartel's ruthless enforcer has other plans for him.

movies.title: The Evil in Us
movies.summary: Six school friends meet up for a fourth of July celebration on a remote island off the Washington coast for a weekend of fun and partying. But the good times quickly turn into a nightmare when they unknowingly take a new bio-active drug containing a virus that causes fits of psychotic rage. Only one girl, Brie, doesn't take the drug and she alone must fight to stay alive as her friends slowly turn into bloodthirsty cannibals. Trapped on the island, Brie must endure the unimaginable and fight for her life.

movies.title: Sleepy Eyes of Death: A Trail of Traps
movies.title_english: Sleepy Eyes of Death: A Trail of Traps
movies.title_long: Sleepy Eyes of Death: A Trail of Traps (1967)
movies.summary: This film of the sleepy-eyed ronin series has the hero talked into escorting a precious religious artifact to Kyoto, Japan. A sect of Christian swordsmen are lying in wait to steal the statuette. What does it take for the reluctant man to accept the assignment? Why, enjoying the company of a virgin daughter of course.

movies.title: Kill Switch
movies.summary: A troubled detective travels to Memphis in order to track down a pair of serial killers.
movies.description_full: A troubled detective travels to Memphis in order to track down a pair of serial killers.
movies.synopsis: A troubled detective travels to Memphis in order to track down a pair of serial killers.
